languages.text: "Крысей жжем. А также мусор, а также всяких иных паразитов. Тут ведь дело какое — район оцеплен на карантин. Дрянь в нем какая-то завелась. Болезнь. А может, и не болезнь, а опять жуки-червяки с какого-нибудь корабля набежали".

"Just burning rats. And some trash, and some parasites of other sorts. The district's under quarantine, you see. It got hit by something nasty. A disease. Or maybe it isn't a disease, just some bugs an' worms what crawled out of some ship or other."
languages.original_text: "Крысей жжем. А также мусор, а также всяких иных паразитов. Тут ведь дело какое — район оцеплен на карантин. Дрянь в нем какая-то завелась. Болезнь. А может, и не болезнь, а опять жуки-червяки с какого-нибудь корабля набежали".

traits.locale_text: "Just burning ratties. And some trash, and some parasites of other sorts. The thing is, the district has been quarantined. It got hit by some nasty thing. A disease. Or maybe it isn't a disease, just some bugs 'n worms what crawled out of some ship or other."

"Just burning ratties. And some trash, and some parasites of other sorts. The thing is, the district has been quarantined. It got hit by some nasty thing. A disease. Or maybe it isn't a disease, just some bugs 'n worms what crawled out of some ship or other."

"Just burning rats. And some trash, and some parasites of other sorts. The district's under quarantine, you see. It got hit by something nasty. A disease. Or maybe it isn't a disease, just some bugs an' worms what crawled out of some ship or other."

"Just burning rats. And some trash, and some parasites of other sorts. The district's under quarantine, you see. It got hit by something nasty. A disease. Or maybe it isn't a disease, just some bugs an' worms what crawled out of some ship or other."

"Just burning rats. And some trash, and some parasites of other sorts. The district's under quarantine, you see. It got hit by something nasty. A disease. Or maybe it isn't a disease, just some bugs an' worms what crawled out of some ship or other."

languages.text: “只是在烧老鼠，烧垃圾，还有别的寄生虫之类的。如你所见，这片区域目前处于隔离状态。某些糟糕的东西袭击了这里，某种疾病。也可能袭击这里的并不是什么疾病，不过是从某艘船或别的什么地方爬出来的臭虫而已。”
languages.original_text: "Just burning rats. And some trash, and some parasites of other sorts. The district's under quarantine, you see. It got hit by something nasty. A disease. Or maybe it isn't a disease, just some bugs an' worms what crawled out of some ship or other."

traits.locale_text: “只是在烧老鼠，烧垃圾，还有别的寄生虫之类的。如你所见，这片区域目前处于隔离状态。某些糟糕的东西袭击了这里，某种疾病。也可能袭击这里的并不是什么疾病，不过是从某艘船或别的什么地方爬出来的臭虫而已。”

languages.text: «Quemar ratas. Y basura. Y parásitos de toda clase. Verá, el distrito está en cuarentena. Ha pasado algo muy feo. Una enfermedad. O igual no es una enfermedad, sino gusanos y bichos que se han escapado de alguna nave».
languages.original_text: "Just burning rats. And some trash, and some parasites of other sorts. The district's under quarantine, you see. It got hit by something nasty. A disease. Or maybe it isn't a disease, just some bugs an' worms what crawled out of some ship or other."

traits.locale_text: «Quemar ratas. Y basura. Y parásitos de toda clase. Verá, el distrito está en cuarentena. Ha pasado algo muy feo. Una enfermedad. O igual no es una enfermedad, sino gusanos y bichos que se han escapado de alguna nave».

languages.text: 「ネズミを焼いてるだけですよ。あとはゴミや寄生体といったものなんかを。地区は隔離中なんです。困ったものに襲われました。病気か…そうではないかもしれません。どこかの船から這い出てきたただの虫かもしれませんね」
languages.original_text: "Just burning rats. And some trash, and some parasites of other sorts. The district's under quarantine, you see. It got hit by something nasty. A disease. Or maybe it isn't a disease, just some bugs an' worms what crawled out of some ship or other."

traits.locale_text: 「ネズミを焼いてるだけですよ。あとはゴミや寄生体といったものなんかを。地区は隔離中なんです。困ったものに襲われました。病気か…そうではないかもしれません。どこかの船から這い出てきたただの虫かもしれませんね」

languages.text: "Wir verbrennen nur Ratten. Und Abfälle und verschiedene Parasiten. Das Viertel steht unter Quarantäne, müsst Ihr wissen. Es wurde von irgendwas Üblem erwischt. Einer Krankheit. Oder vielleicht ist es gar keine Krankheit, nur irgendwelche Käfer und Würmer, die aus einem Schiff rausgekrochen sind."
languages.original_text: "Just burning rats. And some trash, and some parasites of other sorts. The district's under quarantine, you see. It got hit by something nasty. A disease. Or maybe it isn't a disease, just some bugs an' worms what crawled out of some ship or other."

traits.locale_text: "Wir verbrennen nur Ratten. Und Abfälle und verschiedene Parasiten. Das Viertel steht unter Quarantäne, müsst Ihr wissen. Es wurde von irgendwas Üblem erwischt. Einer Krankheit. Oder vielleicht ist es gar keine Krankheit, nur irgendwelche Käfer und Würmer, die aus einem Schiff rausgekrochen sind."

languages.text: « Je brûle des rats. Et puis quelques ordures, et aussi toutes sortes de parasites. Le quartier est en quarantaine, il a pris un sacré coup derrière la nuque. Une maladie, vous comprenez. À moins que ce ne soit pas vraiment une maladie, mais juste des bestioles et des asticots sortis d'un vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: "Just burning rats. And some trash, and some parasites of other sorts. The district's under quarantine, you see. It got hit by something nasty. A disease. Or maybe it isn't a disease, just some bugs an' worms what crawled out of some ship or other."

traits.locale_text: « Je brûle des rats. Et puis quelques ordures, et aussi toutes sortes de parasites. Le quartier est en quarantaine, il a pris un sacré coup derrière la nuque. Une maladie, vous comprenez. À moins que ce ne soit pas vraiment une maladie, mais juste des bestioles et des asticots sortis d'un vaisseau. »

languages.text: "Fare yakıyoruz. Arada çer çöple asalaklar da kaynıyor işte. Semt karantina altında, ondan. Burayı feci bir şey vurmuş. Bir hastalık... Ya da ne bileyim, geminin birinden kurt murt, börtü böcek çıkmıştır belki."
languages.original_text: "Just burning rats. And some trash, and some parasites of other sorts. The district's under quarantine, you see. It got hit by something nasty. A disease. Or maybe it isn't a disease, just some bugs an' worms what crawled out of some ship or other."

traits.locale_text: "Fare falan yakıyorum, arada çer çöp ile tufeyli de gidiyor. Semt karantina altında, ondan. Feci şeyler oldu. Bir hastalık vurdu. Belki hastalık değil de gemiden bir yerden kurt murt çıkmıştır gerçi bilemiyorum."
